p: In bruise detection of agriculture product, a machine vision system is integrated with optical filter at 740 and 950 nm to detect the bruise in rotating apple with a detection accuracy of 90 to 92% from 54 Pink Lady apples and 60 Ginger Gold apples [ 162]. In addition, the bruise detection in mushroom is carried out through a line scanning hyperspectral imaging instrument from 400 to 1000 nm with a spectroscopic resolution of 5 nm [ 163]. The PCA is applied to a set of data comprising of 50 normal and 50 bruise spectra, with standard deviation of 0.025 and 0.055, respectively.
